```lisp
[
  (:action find ; Find a resource and update the state of a group
    :parameters (?p - player ?g - group ?t - target ?l - location ?e - equipment)
    :precondition (and
      (or (group_formed ?g) (not (group_formed ?g)))
      (or (not (has_meeting_place ?g)) (not (gear_gathered ?g)) (not (has_victim ?g)))
      (or (not (secured ?l)) (not (organized ?e)) (not (target ?t)))
    )
    :effect (and
      (or (has_meeting_place ?g) (gear_gathered ?g) (has_victim ?g))
    )
  )
  (:action setup ; Set up a resource/task and update its status
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?target - target ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (not (setup_done ?target ?context)) (eligible ?entity ?target ?context))
    :effect (and (setup_done ?target ?context) (assigned ?entity ?target ?context))
  )
  (:action setup ; Set up a group and update its status
    :parameters (?p - player ?g - group ?c - context)
    :precondition (and (not (setup_done ?g ?c)) (trustworthy ?p ?g ?c))
    :effect (and (setup_done ?g ?c) (assigned ?p ?g ?c))
  )
  (:action setup ; Set up a team and update its status
    :parameters (?employee - person ?team - team ?project - project)
    :precondition (and (not (setup_done ?team ?project)) (eligible ?employee ?team ?project))
    :effect (and (setup_done ?team ?project) (assigned ?employee ?team ?project))
  )
]
```
